data.name: 001 Game Creator - Point & Click Adventure Kit
data.detailed_description: The Point & Click Adventure Expansion DLC provides 001 Game Creator users with a brand new template designed to create PnC games. The package comes with several pre-made assets/backdrops to allow users to immediately jump in and start building their dream PnC games. Players can build directly off this template or use the assets/scripts to create their own from scratch.

data.short_description: Explore environments, solve puzzles and interact with a story using the mouse cursor.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Danish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL v2.1 or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL v3.0 or above
